old: 協力し、ともに使命達成を
new: Working together to achieve our mission

old: よろしくお願い申し上げる
new: Thank you for your cooperation.

old: 同行の覚者よ、あなたに忠義を尽くそう
new: Gathered Arisen, let us serve you with loyalty

old: 信頼に足る方とお見受けした
new: I see you as trustworthy.

old: 任務成功に向け、最善を尽くす所存
new: We will do our best to make the mission a success.

old: 良き連携のために、最大限努力しよう
new: Let's do our utmost for good cooperation.

old: 我が主、同士の存在を確認
new: My Lord, confirming the presence of a peer.

old: 任務終了
new: Mission Completed

old: ほぼ計算通り
new: Almost exactly as calculated.

old: この成功は必然
new: This success is inevitable.

old: ――これは、想定外の結果
new: --this is an unexpected result.

old: 基本能力、上昇
new: Basic Abilities, Increased

old: より高度な戦闘力を獲得！
new: Acquired a higher level of combat power!

old: この力、全て我が主の為に
new: All this power, all this power for my Lord.

old: まずは周辺状況の確認を
new: First, check the surrounding conditions.

old: 帰路の確保を怠らぬよう
new: Be sure not to neglect securing the return route

old: 敵影認識。警戒態勢へ
new: Enemy shadow recognized. Go to alert.

old: 討伐対象を捕捉
new: Capture the target for extermination

new: Enemy spotted!　Stay alert!

old: 脅威となる敵発見。慎重に！
new: Threatening enemy detected. Be careful!

old: 強敵と判断――最大の警戒を！
new: Judged to be a strong enemy--maximum caution!

old: 支援感謝する
new: Appreciate the support.

old: 支援要求！
new: Support Request!

old: まずい、救援を！
new: Help! It's bad!

old: せ、戦線――離脱――
new: The... front line... withdrawal...

old: 不覚！　行動――不能に――
new: Arisen! Inaction――Inability to――

old: 敵排除、開始する！
new: Enemy elimination, begin!

old: 戦闘態勢へ移行！
new: Shifted to battle stance!

new: Target silenced. Decent results.

old: 脅威の排除を完了
new: Complete threat elimination

old: 戦闘終了！　我々の勝利
new: The battle is over!　We win.

old: 対象の足止めに成功！
new: Successfully stopped the target!

old: 負傷はあるが、問題なし
new: Injured, but no problems.

old: 状態注意。　早めの対処を
new: Status attention. Take action as soon as possible

old: 負傷部位、拡大――！
new: Injury site, expanding――!

old: この状況での任務継続は困難――
new: It would be difficult to continue the mission under these circumstances--

old: く、早急な立て直しが必要――
new: Quick, we need to regroup immediately――

old: なっ！？　これでは全ての戦略が無駄に――
new: What?　All of our strategies have been in vain.

old: 少々――時間を――
new: Just-- just a moment-- just a moment.

old: ただちに回復する！
new: Recover immediately!

old: 敵の誘導は、私が
new: I'm going to guide the enemy.

old: 援護する！
new: Cover!

old: 回避する！
new: Avoid!

old: そこ！
new: There!

old: 必中！
new: A must!

old: 必ず仕留める！
new: We will make sure to finish them off!

old: ここから跳躍を！
new: Take the leap from here!

old: 了解した
new: Understood.

old: 命令に従う
new: follow orders

old: 承服しかねる
new: find it hard to accept

old: 装備・道具には重々の確認を
new: Check your equipment and tools very carefully.

old: 我が主よ、出立の時が近いとお見受けする
new: My Lord, I see that the time for your departure is near.

old: 疲労が溜まる前に、適度に休憩を
new: Take a moderate break before fatigue sets in.

old: 休息も心身の安定には不可欠
new: Rest is also essential for mental and physical stability

old: よき眠りを、我が主
new: Sleep well, my Lord.

old: 主よ、お休みの間ここに待機していよう
new: Lord, I'll wait here while you rest.

new: Indoor scenery changes

old: 模様替えの妙――実感
new: The strangeness of redecorating--a realization

new: Excellent results in this area search!

old: 書を読むことも 主のため――
new: I read books for the Lord.

new: Lord, I sense a presence in the garden.

old: 栄養学的には完璧――
new: Nutritionally perfect--

old: 最善を尽くすと約束しよう
new: I promise I will do my best.

old: 必ずや主をお守りする
new: I will surely protect you Lord.

new: This warfare technique should help you.

old: 戦術に変更有り
new: Tactics have changed

old: 休息の間、私にできることがあればいかようにも――
new: If there is anything I can do to help you during this time of rest, please let me know.

old: 我が主の、次なる目的に備えよう
new: Let us prepare for our Lord's next purpose.

new: Lord, what is your purpose today?

old: 呼びかけに応えよう
new: Answering the Call.

old: 全ては主がため――
new: All for the Lord's sake.

先日、異なる覚者からの要請により

craft assistance at the request of a different memorandum of understanding and received an evaluation

私の意思疎通力が向上した

My days of following the Lord have improved my
communication skills.

居住性が向上した

Confirmation that new household goods are available--

new: My Lord's return, we have been waiting for you.

old: 主の無事を確認
new: Confirmation that the Lord is safe.

new: This concludes this escort.

old: 長旅となったものの無事、帰宅
